org.ivar.leveltools.TiledLevel

type
class
extends
Level

Static Methods

public loadLevel(xmlString : String, ?assetsPath : String, ?addToScene : Bool, ?tilemapAddCallback : TilemapAddCallback, ?objectAddCallback : ObjectAddCallback) : TiledLevel

Loads a level from a xml string using the specified asset path.
Parameters:
xmlString - the xml exported from Tiled.
assetsPath - Path to the assets directory from the project's root dir (usually the one containing the .nmml file).
addToScene - if this is true, the level will be added to the current state as soon as the level is loaded.
tilemapAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a tilemap is loaded.
objectAddCallback - a callback that is called every time an object (sprite) is loaded.
Returns:
a populated instance of TiledLevel.

Constructor

public new(assetsPath : String, tilemapAddCallback : TilemapAddCallback, objectAddCallback : ObjectAddCallback)
Constructs the object and initalizes members, but doesn't actually parse anything.
Parameters:
assetsPath - Path to the assets directory from the project's root dir (usually the one containing the .nmml file).
tilemapAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a tilemap is loaded.
objectAddCallback - a callback that is called every time an object (sprite) is loaded.
linkAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a link is loaded.
Returns:
Nothing.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

private addTilemap(name : String, width : Int, height : Int, tileWidth : Int, tileHeight : Int, csv : String, tilesetPath : String, properties : Properties) : Void

Creates a FlxTilemap from parsed xml and adds it to the master layer. If specified, the tilemapAddCallback is called with the loaded tilemap as argument.
Parameters:
group - The group of the layer this map belongs to
mapNode - The node that contains tilemap data
layerNode - The node that contains layer data
Returns:
Nothing.

private addTileset(name : String, tileWidth : Int, tileHeight : Int, imagePath : String) : Void

Adds the parsed tileset to the tileset hashtable.
Parameters:
name - name of the tileset
tileWidth - width of a tile in pixels
tileHeight - height of a tile in pixels
imagePath - path to the tileset image
Returns:
Nothing.

private parseLayer(layerNode : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Loads a single layer and adds it to the master layer.
Parameters:
layerNode - the node that contains the layer
Returns:
Nothing.

private parseLevel(addToScene : Bool, map : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Parses the level from a loaded xml file.
Parameters:
addToScene - if true, the level will be added to the current state when loaded
map - parsed xml that contains the level data
Returns:
Nothing.

private parseTileset(tilesetNode : haxe.xml.Fast) : Void

Loads a tileset and stores it into the tilesets table. Used internally.
Parameters:
tilesetNode -
Returns:
Nothing.

private sanitizeCSV(csv : String) : String

Tiled editor exports csv that contains an extra ',' every line (as well as a few extra newlines), which flixel refuses to parse. This method parses the csv, changes the values (decrements all indexes) and generates a csv string flixel can parse.
Parameters:
csv - the csv string.
Returns:
parsed csv string.
